description:
The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. But Frieren will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to understand what life means to the people around her? Decades after their victory, the funeral of one her friends confronts Frieren with her own near immortality. Frieren sets out to fulfill the last wishes of her comrades and finds herself beginning a new adventure…

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Frieren - Oltre la Fine del Viaggio
คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren
Frieren e a Jornada para o Além
Frieren – Nach dem Ende der Reise
Frieren: Más allá del final del viaje

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Philosophy
tags.description: Relating or devoted to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality, and existence.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Asexual
tags.description: Features a character who isn't sexually attracted to people of any sex or gender.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Rotoscoping
tags.description: Animation technique that animators use to trace over motion picture footage, frame by frame, to produce realistic action.

tags.name: Aromantic
tags.description: Features a character who experiences little to no romantic attraction.

tags.name: Dungeon
tags.description: Prominently features a dungeon environment.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Snowscape
tags.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Clone
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an artificial exact copy of another organism.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

node.description:
__Residency:__ Hino City, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Berklee College of Music (Department of Film Scoring)

[Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/evancall) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/evan.call.33) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0nMGbTpPx4b3h5fMG9CpWJ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/realevancall)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kei_globster) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/kei_globster2) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@keirabat) | [Tumblr](https://kei1-glob.tumblr.com/)

Keiichirou Saitou is a Japanese anime director and animator.

In 2016 he graduated from the Animation Department of the Faculty of Manga at Kyoto Seika University. He can be recognized from his work directing both [BOCCHI THE ROCK!](https://anilist.co/anime/130003/BOCCHI-THE-ROCK/) and [Frieren: Beyond Journey's End](https://anilist.co/anime/154587/Frieren-Beyond-Journeys-End/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/reiko_0157) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=reiko_nagasawa)

Reiko Nagasawa is an animator and character designer, raised and currently affiliated with Madhouse. She started her career in 2014 as an in-betweener for the studio. In 2021, she debuted as a character designer for [takt op.Destiny](https://anilist.co/anime/131565/takt-opDestiny/).

Married to fellow animator [Tooru Iwasawa](https://anilist.co/staff/131949/Tooru-Iwasawa).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/62002633)

An animation producer working at [Madhouse](https://anilist.co/studio/11/). Formerly a production manager at [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/94072097)

Close friends with [Kai Shibata](https://anilist.co/staff/132094/).

Married to fellow Animator [Reiko Nagasawa](https://anilist.co/staff/140343).
She is currently working at MADBOX.
**Sugiyama Shinji (杉山晋史)** is a Japanese art designer and background artist.
Kimura Kashiko is an editor working for Mad Box.
Shouji Hata is an Audio Engineer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/AmaaTodd)

Originating from [Telecom Animation Film](https://anilist.co/studio/94/). Currently freelance.

[Website](https://www.milet.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/milet_music) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/milet_music/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/miletOfficialYouTubeChannel) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milet) Biography milet is a Japanese pop singer-songwriter under SME Records (2019-). She made her debut on March 6, 2019 with her first EP named inside you EP, with the lead track "inside you" being used as the opening theme for the drama QUEEN. (Source: Wikipedia)
